title: Drawing, "A Fireplace Wall and Two Alternative Ceiling Schemes", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and dark brown ink on lighblue laid paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. At left, division of ceiling into panels, below, short side of room. At right, elevation of wall of room with chimney mantel piece, and ceiling. Verso: two sketches for division of same ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Fireplace Wall and Two Alternative Ceiling Schemes", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and dark brown ink on lighblue laid paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1539.
